metadata.title: CVE-2015-4000 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
The TLS protocol 1.2 and earlier, when a DHE_EXPORT ciphersuite is enabledon a server but not on a client, does not properly convey a DHE_EXPORTchoice, which allows man-in-the-middle attackers to conductcipher-downgrade attacks by rewriting a ClientHello with DHE replaced byDHE_EXPORT and then rewriting a ServerHello with DHE_EXPORT replaced byDHE, aka the "Logjam" issue.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-4000` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libssl1.1 - 1.0.2a-1ubuntu1
openssl - 1.0.2a-1ubuntu1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

libnss3 - 2:3.19.2-1ubuntu1
libnss3-tools - 2:3.19.2-1ubuntu1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro
